# [[borneol]] (a white crystalline [[substance]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to activate "qi" and to treat symptoms of stroke or coma.) Borneol exists in both natural and synthetic forms, and may be used for both external (topical) and internal applications. Safe dosages for internal use are usually given as 300mg per day or less.
